LG TV Plus

Brief: LG TV Plus is a companion app designed exclusively for LG webOS Smart TVs released from 2014 onwards. It allows users to pair their mobile device with their LG TV through the same Wi-Fi network, enhancing the overall viewing and interaction experience by providing additional functionality such as content sharing and screen mirroring from the smartphone to the TV.

  • üì∫ Screen Mirroring: Effortlessly mirror your smartphone screen to your LG TV, a feature available for LG Smartphones with Android O or later.
  • üìÖ Calendar Integration: Read and display calendar information from your device on your TV with webOS versions from 2016 and above.
